# Diego's Personal Website

## Home
- URL: /
- Description: Personal portfolio and introduction for Diego, a software engineer. Contains social links (GitHub, Twitter, LinkedIn) and a brief bio.

## Blog
- URL: /blog
- Description: A collection of technical articles and thoughts on software engineering, web development, and productivity.

### Recent Posts
- URL: /blog/hello-world
- Description: An introductory post welcoming readers to the new blog.
- URL: /blog/future-of-web-dev
- Description: Insights into upcoming trends in web development like Edge Computing and AI.
